The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 02 July is 44,896 (5,174.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 27 June, there were 874 new confirmed cases (100.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 June, there were 519 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 68% (355 extra cases).
